title: Honor confusion
body: I have honor 5 and have received zero honor capsules. Meanwhile, my friends have received multiple honor capsules and they are lower honor than me.

replies.body: Keep in mind that the Honor Capsules are random drops and not guaranteed at any specific Honor Rank. They replace key fragment drops when you get them, so if you've already gotten all your available fragments for the 28-day cycle you won't see any drop until those fragments refresh.
